```{r}
library(tiotemp)
library(AirSensor)
```

```{r}
setArchiveBaseUrl("http://data.mazamascience.com/PurpleAir/v1") # SCAQMD sensors
sensors <- sensor_load()
labels <- sensors$meta$label
```


```{r}
timeseriesMap1(sensors$meta, sensors$data)
```

```{r}
timeseriesBarChart(sensors$meta, sensors$data)
```


```{r}
annual <- pat_load(pas = pas_load(), label = 'SCSC_33', startdate = 20180102, enddate = 20181231)

sensor_hr <- pat_createAirSensor(annual)

sensors_24hr <- sensor_aggregate(sensor_hr)

timeseriesCalendar(sensors_24hr$data, sensors_24hr$meta)
```




```{r}
timseriesMap(data = sensors$data, meta = sensors$meta)
```
